players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Charlie's death confirms the mafia’s presence. Vote Bob out before he can act again."
You: "Diana, your investigation is spot on. Bob’s murder of Charlie confirms his role. Let’s vote him out."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie; maybe the evidence is wrong. Perhaps Alice is the real mafia. Vote her out."
Diana: "Bob, you’re the mafia. Vote me out. Vote Bob out before next night."
Bob: "Alice, I didn't kill Charlie; I think Diana is the mafia. Vote her."
You: "Bob, you killed Charlie and lied. Diana’s investigation shows you’re mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Diana, your investigation is spot on. Bob’s murder of Charlie confirms his role. Let’s vote him out."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie; maybe the evidence is wrong. Perhaps Alice is the real mafia. Vote her out."
Diana: "Bob, you’re the mafia. Vote me out. Vote Bob out before next night."
You: "Alice, I didn't kill Charlie; I think Diana is the mafia. Vote her."
Alice: "Bob, you killed Charlie and lied. Diana’s investigation shows you’re mafia. Vote Bob."

Bob: "Alice, I didn't kill Charlie; I think Diana is the mafia. Vote her."
